questions.question: What's the role of rapid testing currently in the next, you know, what is it, three, four months maybe?
So from the engineering approach to public health, what kind of problems do you think can be tackled?
Is there a way forward to gain trust of people or to do this well?
Can we talk about the future of viruses that might be threatening our very existence?
Is that a crazy thought or is this a natural place where this technology may go?
What do you think is the meaning of life, this whole orchestra we've got going on?
And maybe from another perspective, is how does one live a meaningful life, if such is possible?
